permafrost.tundra.lang

Class LocaleHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.lang.LocaleHelper

  • public class LocaleHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with Locale objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.Locale toLocale(com.wm.data.IData document)
      Converts an IData locale object to a Locale object.
      static java.util.Locale toLocale(java.lang.String language, java.lang.String country, java.lang.String variant)
      Returns a new Locale object for the given language, country and variant

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • toLocale

        public static java.util.Locale toLocale(java.lang.String language,
                                        java.lang.String country,
                                        java.lang.String variant)
        Returns a new Locale object for the given language, country and variant
        Parameters:
        language - An ISO 639 alpha-2 or alpha-3 language code, or a language subtag up to 8 characters in length. See the Locale class description about valid language values.
        country - An ISO 3166 alpha-2 country code or a UN M.49 numeric-3 area code. See the Locale class description about valid country values.
        variant - Any arbitrary value used to indicate a variation of a Locale. See the Locale class description for the details.
        Returns:
        A new Locale object.

      • toLocale

        public static java.util.Locale toLocale(com.wm.data.IData document)
        Converts an IData locale object to a Locale object.
        Parameters:
        document - The IData locale object to be converted.
        Returns:
        A Locale object representing the given locale.
